displayName.english: If I did not choose this...
displayName.schinese: 当初如果不选这个的话……
displayName.tchinese: 當初如果不選這個的話……

displayName.english: I heard that the stuff is hidden here
I want my brother by my side
displayName.schinese: 我也想要师兄陪在身边
displayName.tchinese: 我也想要師兄陪在身邊

displayName.english: What about nine lives? Are there only two?
displayName.schinese: 不是九命吗？怎么才两命？
displayName.tchinese: 不是九命嗎？怎麼才兩命？

displayName.english: Can I learn this trick too?

description.schinese: 以普通的推理难度通关
description.tchinese: 以普通的推理難度通關

displayName.english: Crack the Case (by literally crack people's butt)

description.english: Beat the Normal or higher battle difficulty
description.schinese: 以普通以上的战斗难度通关
description.tchinese: 以普通以上的戰鬥難度通關

displayName.english: Crack the Case (by crack everything into dust)

description.schinese: 以困难的战斗难度通关
description.tchinese: 以困難的戰鬥難度通關

description.english: Learn all of the Art of the Sword
Learn all of the Art of the Fist
Learn all of the Art of the Saber
Learn all of the Art of the Polearm

displayName.english: I knew you are up to something

description.schinese: 完成有关公孙妤的所有任务
description.tchinese: 完成有關公孫妤的所有任務

description.schinese: 完成有关温翠书的所有任务
description.tchinese: 完成有關溫翠書的所有任務

description.schinese: 完成有关杨飞彤的所有任务
description.tchinese: 完成有關楊飛彤的所有任務

description.schinese: 完成有关殷芙的所有任务
description.tchinese: 完成有關殷芙的所有任務

description.schinese: 完成有关雯姬的所有任务
description.tchinese: 完成有關雯姬的所有任務

description.schinese: 完成有关任芸的所有任务
description.tchinese: 完成有關任芸的所有任務

description.english: Damage from a single attack over 5000
Damage from a single attack over 20000
Damage from a single attack over 50000

description.schinese: 使敌人进入破绽状态中10次
description.tchinese: 使敵人進入破綻狀態中10次

description.schinese: 使敌人进入破绽状态中100次
description.tchinese: 使敵人進入破綻狀態中100次

description.english: Use show to end a battle
description.schinese: 以出示结束任何一场战斗
description.tchinese: 以出示結束任何一場戰鬥

displayName.english: What should I do when fishing?
displayName.schinese: 钓鱼的过程该做些什么？
displayName.tchinese: 釣魚的過程該做些什麼？

displayName.english: Dog or cat person? I'm a Skylar person!
Tell my name for a discount
displayName.schinese: 报上我的名号可以打折
displayName.tchinese: 報上我的名號可以打折

displayName.english: Your flattery is a little too much
Is this too cheap or too expensive?
displayName.schinese: 我该说这太便宜还是太贵了？
displayName.tchinese: 我該說這太便宜還是太貴了？

description.english: The real mystery should be how the box moves back to the start position after you fail.
description.schinese: 箱子推错了，还能瞬间复原才是最大的谜题吧？
description.tchinese: 箱子推錯了，還能瞬間復原才是最大的謎題吧？

description.schinese: 在皎烟炉中丢过10次垃圾
description.tchinese: 在皎煙爐中丟過10次垃圾

description.schinese: 原来天外飞仙真的存在啊......？
description.tchinese: 原來天外飛仙真的存在啊......？

displayName.english: Knock on wood till it breaks

description.english: Have you ever cared about the people who keep resetting the vase?
description.schinese: 你有想过老四老五老六一直重新摆罐的心情吗？
description.tchinese: 你有想過老四老五老六一直重新擺罐的心情嗎？

description.english: Cat? Dog? Eagle? Gotta catch 'em all!
description.schinese: 养猫？养狗？养鹰？我全都要！
description.tchinese: 養貓？養狗？養鷹？我全都要！

description.english: New romance may coming up on the coast...
description.schinese: 海岸可能有新的恋情即将发生……
description.tchinese: 海岸可能有新的戀情即將發生……

description.english: Assist Baotan to finish the case!

description.schinese: 那一夜，真的只是纯粹饮酒吗？
description.tchinese: 那一夜，真的只是純粹飲酒嗎？

description.english: Solve the turmoil in the North

description.schinese: 完成有关耶律和琅的所有任务
description.tchinese: 完成有關耶律和琅的所有任務
